column4: Hello, I cannot get my microphone to work in ubuntu feisty. Anyone know of any tools or anything i could use to troubleshoot it? I need it working asap.
try the rear pink input instead of the front.
thats what im using, its still not working
when i use sound recorder it just plays static and none of the sound comes through
any other ideas? i really need it working.
gotcha
ok
dont have that option actually. just have 3 tabs, playback, recording, options, options is where i choose front or rear
or... line and front
under the recording tab all i have is capture and mux, and if i mute one or the other it says my recording settings are invalid in sound recorder
gotcha
dont have microphone in there. got PCM, front, surround, center, LFE, side, capture, input sources, and mux.
how do i go about doin that
im not a noob but the asound.rc file scares me lol
yeah, i get alsa, and oss
cant use oss though as that only permits one source of sound at a time, i need multiple going
im on alsa
done
one has red below the meter, L R CAPTUR is in red
i know, all the tuts on the web say the same thing, yet i dont
default hda intel one, built into mobo. I do have a soundblaster audigy i can throw in though
one front, one rear
i did multiple times today, neither work. I might just give a shot throwing the audigy in
ok cool, give it a shot.
